product_name: Mountain Khakis Downtown Snap Down Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Downtown Snap Down Jacket from Mountain Khakis is ready to cruise down the ski slopes and keep you warm in teh village thanks to 630 fill-power goose down insulation. High-quality 630-fill-power grey goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Nylon super-high-density faille shell has a durable water repellent finish. Polyester taffeta lining slides on easily over a sweater or base layer. Stylish diamond quilt pattern with flat-faced yoke and arms. Zippered hand pockets set on contoured seams. Grosgrain-reinforced front snap placket; snaps at cuffs, too. Mountain Khakis Downtown Snap Down Jacket for women has an elastic center-back waist for a contemporary, feminine fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Downtown Snap Down Jacket from Mountain Khakis is ready to cruise down the ski slopes and keep you warm in teh village thanks to 630 fill-power goose down insulation.
